about_me: Hello! My name is Socrates and I am 30 years old. Although I am an engineer, teaching is my passion, and I have been working as a Greek teacher for the last 5 years. teaching_style: I provide classes to all levels of learners. Therefore, I can teach absolute beginners from scratch as well as advanced learners that already have a high level of Greek. In both cases, my goal is to make you speak as much as you can in Greek through various activities in a friendly and non-judgemental environment. Please, feel free to make a lot of mistakes, since I believe that only through our mistakes do we get better.

about_me:

Hi, 

My name is Michael and I am from Birmingham, in the United Kingdom. I have been teaching on Italki for almost two years, and I have recently completed a CELTA qualification. I am now offering IELTS preparation. 

I am a native speaker of English. I offer conversational practice, discussion topics, grammar lessons, pronunciation practice and descriptive activities. I design courses and lessons based on what you need and want from a lesson.

short_signature: Discussion topic lessons for adults delivered by a CELTA-qualified teacher. IELTS available.
teaching_style:
I have an informal, conversational teaching style. My lessons are focussed on discussion topics, but I also teach grammar and pronunciation. I prepare my own teaching materials. 

I can support any student from beginners to intermediates and advanced learners. 

You choose the topic that you want to discuss and the vocabulary or grammatical points that you'd like to focus on.

Please note: I do not teach children.

I learned to speak, read, and write in Japanese and have come to believe that the most important part of learning a language is to speak and interact with native speakers of your target language. I have two years of teaching experience with the GOEIGO
